nodes.text: The 2-M Saber-class repulsortank, or 2-M Hover Tank, was a model of repulsorlift tank used by the Galactic Empire. Equipped with powerful laser cannons, it excelled against heavily fortified defenses, but its slow speed left it vulnerable to rocket turrets. Thanks to its shield generator, the Saber-class had an exceptional beam defense for a ground-based vehicle. The Saber-class repulsortank also spawned a scout variant, the Scout-class 2-M repulsor tank.
It was used in combat on Tatooine shortly after the Battle of Yavin.
The 2-M Hover Tank originally debuted in the video game Star Wars: Empire at War. It eventually returned to canon in the mobile game Star Wars: Commander.
